newsitem.title: MEXICO: April heavy vehicle sales in Mexico surge 120 pct.
newsitem.headline: April heavy vehicle sales in Mexico surge 120 pct.

text.p: Heavy vehicle sales in Mexico's domestic market rose 120.91 percent in April to 1,319 units from the same month last year, the National Association of Bus, Truck and Tractor-Trailer makers said on Monday.
It said exports in the same month rose 104.6 percent to 399 units.
Sales in the domestic market in April 1996 were 597 units.
The year-on-year rise for the first four-month period this year was 109.95 percent, to a total of 4,113 units, it said.

"Continuing with this growth rate which builds on the same upward trend seen in the second half of 1996, by the end of 1997 we will definitely have achieved sales of 15,000 units," the association said in statement.
